channel.title: Uke Along Artist » Los Del Rio

item.title: Los Del Rio - Macarena - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Only 1 Chord Used: G
For a "not-so-simplified" version of this ukulele play along, click here: https://youtu.be/y03Bp1W0tDs.
La Macarena by Los Del Rio. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Original Just Dance Unlimited Video: http://youtube.com/watch?v=Nt-0yK9gPv4

item.title: Los Del Rio - Macarena - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. For a SIMPLIFIED 1 chord version, click here: https://youtu.be/ET7NTSOmUWw .
Chords Used: G F
La Macarena by Los Del Rio. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Original Just Dance Unlimited Video: http://youtube.com/watch?v=Nt-0yK9gPv4
